plugins.publishCmd: git config --global user.name 'github-actions[bot]' && git config --global user.email '41898282+github-actions[bot]@users.noreply.github.com' && git checkout -b release/v${nextRelease.version} && git add CHANGELOG.md Cargo.toml Cargo.lock && git commit -m 'chore(release): ${nextRelease.version} [skip ci]' && git push origin release/v${nextRelease.version} && gh pr create --title 'chore(release): ${nextRelease.version} [RELEASE]' --body 'Automated release PR for version ${nextRelease.version}\n\n${nextRelease.notes}' --base main --head release/v${nextRelease.version} && gh pr merge --squash --auto
